front.title: TCP-CCC: single-path TCP congestion control coupling

abstract.t: This document specifies a method, TCP-CCC, to combine the congestion controls of multiple TCP connections between the same pair of hosts. This can have several performance benefits, and it makes it possible to precisely assign a share of the congestion window to the connections based on priorities. This document also addresses the problem that TCP connections between the same pair of hosts may not share the same path. We discuss methods to detect if, or enforce that connections traverse a common bottleneck.
